mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{ member_no } ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT P.MEMBER_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY OL.QUANTITY DESC) as RANK, NVL(OL.QUANTITY, 0) as QUANTITY, NVL(OL.QUANTITY*P.PRODUCT_PRICE, 0) as TOTAL FROM PRODUCT P, (SELECT PRODUCT_NO, SUM(ORDER_QUANTITY) as QUANTITY FROM O_ORDER_LIST GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO) OL WHERE OL.PRODUCT_NO(+) = P.PRODUCT_NO AND P.MEMBER_NO = #{ member_no } AND PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y' AND QUANTITY > 0
